title: World of Warcraft + BC + Private Server + Easy to set up
description:
I .zip&#039;d my World of Warcraft directory into parts to share this MMORPG to anyone interested, plus it already points to the private servers at WoWScape.net. All you need to do is go to http://logon.wowscape.net/register.php and make your account, then you&#039;re good to go!

NOTE: Unzip WoW.zip first, and make sure the following go into their own folders in your WoW folder.

Cache.zip
data.zip
errors.zip
interface.zip
logs.zip
screenshots.zip
uninstall.zip
WTF.zip

Then, you&#039;re good to go. Also I suggest WoWLegion.

Enjoy! Everything is already patched and ready. All you need to do is make an account for WoWLegion/WoWScape/WoWStorm/Whatever.
